law.catch_line: Use of sirens and flashing blue lights restricted.
law.text: No vessel equipped with a siren or a flashing, rotating, or oscillating blue light may be operated upon waterways of this state except boats operated by the department or law-enforcement vessels of any law-enforcement agency of the Commonwealth having jurisdiction upon the waters of this state or law-enforcement vessels of the United States authorized by federal law or regulations.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 292, sec. 26.
